overview: Young Syahirah and Fazlur are childhood sweethearts. They promised to marry when Fazlur returned from his studies abroad, but when he does return, he marries someone else. Heartbroken, Syahirah leaves for Uzbekistan, where she finds work. One day, she meets Iskandar, who convinces her to give love another chance.
title: Seandainya Kau Ada
